title: All quiet on the Western Front
creator_credit: Delbert Mann, Norman Rosemont and Marble Arch Productions
brief_description: Made for television, this adaptation of Erich Maria Remarque’s passionate anti-war novel is a remake of the 1930’s film classic about young German soldiers in the Great war of 1914-18, and of the veteran who teaches them to grow up fast in the trenches. Stars Richard Thomas, Ernest Borgnine, Patricia Neal, Ian Holm and Donald Pleasence.
